title: Alto's Adventure V 1.0.0 IPhone IOS.ipa
description:
Above the placid ivory snow lies a sleepy mountain village, brimming with the promise of adventure.

Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.

Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders Ã¢â‚¬â€œ all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Chain together combos to maximize points and speed

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Challenge your friends with Game Center. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design
